title: Temple
whatToAsk: What do you want to ask?
yourWish: What is your wish to the heavens?
placeholder_career: How will my career luck be next month?
placeholder_wish: May fortune smile upon me next month...
enterNumbers: Enter three numbers, and the oracle will reveal your guidance.
chooseToken: Choose your token and offer your payment
chooseOffering: Choose your sacred token and the size of your offering
getDivinationFailed: Failed to get divination result, please try again later
chooseAnyCurrency: Choose any currency, pay any amount
invalidAmount: Please enter a valid payment amount
loadDivinationFailed: Failed to load divination result, please try again later
missingDataOrNotPaid: Missing divination data or payment not completed
shareBlessingContent: I experienced incense offering and prayer at Yunmeng Temple, sincerely making wishes for good luck! With incense wafting and wishes conveyed, my heart is filled with hope and strength. This traditional blessing method brings inner peace, as if establishing a connection with the divine. May my wishes come true, and may all friends who see this share be blessed with success and continuous good fortune! If you also want to experience this traditional blessing method, why not give it a try - you might have unexpected gains! Let us find inner tranquility in this fast-paced world and face every challenge in life with a devout heart. May all beautiful wishes come true!
